page.title: 04Mayday Celebrations
page.content: It was Friday afternoon and time to start the May celebrations. First it was the country dancers. There are no boys in the group, only girls. Next was the Bike Derby; our teacher set out a course for the boys to go round on their bikes and whoever had the best time got a prize. Then the maypole dancers were on; there are 24 girls but only 12 ribbons so we took it in turns. The infants skipped around the maypole in pairs which they made a right mess of; one lost his shoe and sat down in the middle of the circle to put it back on and a great queue built up waiting for him. Then when our head teacher told them to stop they kept going and she had to round them up. The mayqueen was then crowned. Everyone voted for a girl to be queen. The mayqueen was given a present and everyone had their picnic.
